description: A pun on 'windows' causing a computer to 'freeze'.
title: Cold Bytes
n_1: Dave shivered in his chilly office, noticing his laptop screen frozen.
c1_1: Why is my computer so slow today?
n_2: He tried restarting it, but the laptop remained unresponsive.
n_3: Dave then realized he had left many browser windows open overnight.
n_4: He laughed at the irony of his 'frozen' computer due to 'windows'.
c1_4: Guess it's time to close some windows!
